select t1.id,t1.task_name,t1.company_id,t1.task_store_type,count(t2.id) as store_num, t1.task_shopping_guide_type,count(t3.id) as shopping_guide_num,t1.task_status, t4.start_time,t4.end_time from cp_task_info t1 join cp_task_store_info t2 on t1.id=t2.task_id and t2.del_flag=0 join cp_task_shopping_guide_info t3 on t1.id=t3.id and t3.del_flag=0 join cp_task_frequency_info t4 on t1.id=t4.task_id and t4.del_flag=0 where t1.del_flag=0 AND t1.task_name like CONCAT('%', #{et.taskName},'%') AND t1.task_type=#{et.taskType} AND t1.company_id=#{et.companyId} AND t1.task_status=#{et.taskStatus}
order by t1.update_time desc
